officers.name: Alex Chen
officers.bio: Passionate about algorithmic trading and quantitative strategies. Led the team to victory in the 2023 CFA Institute Research Challenge.

officers.name: Sarah Johnson
officers.bio: Specializes in risk management and portfolio optimization. Former intern at Goldman Sachs Quantitative Strategies.

officers.name: Michael Rodriguez
officers.bio: Focuses on derivatives pricing and market microstructure. Active in developing our paper trading platform.

officers.name: Emily Watson
officers.bio: Expert in machine learning applications for financial modeling. Leads our data analysis workshops.

officers.name: David Kim
officers.bio: Organizes trading competitions and guest speaker events. Former software engineer at a fintech startup.

officers.name: Jessica Liu
officers.bio: Manages club communications and recruitment. Creates engaging content for our social media presence.
